Test Case Title: The account number must not be left blank.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the account number field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"account number is required".

Test Case Title: The account number can't contain any characters.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the account number containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The account number can't contain any special character.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the account number containing special characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Special characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The account number must be numbered.
Test Steps:
1- Enter an existing account number containing only numbers.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result: The system should move the manager to the next field with no errors.

Test Case Title: The account must not start with a space.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the account number starting with a space.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The amount lower limit must not be left blank.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the amount lower limit field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"amount lower limit is required".

Test Case Title: The amount lower limit can't contain any characters.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the amount lower limit containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The amount lower limit can't contain any special character.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the amount lower limit containing special characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Special characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The amount lower limit must be numbered.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the amount lower limit containing only numbers.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result: The system should move the manager to the next field with no errors.

Test Case Title: The number of transactions must not be left blank.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the number of transactions field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
" number of transactions is required".

Test Case Title: The number of transactions can't contain any characters.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the number of transactions containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The number of transactions can't contain any special character.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the number of transactions containing special characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Special characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The number of transactions must be numbered.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the number of transactions containing only numbers.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result: The system should move the manager to the next field with no errors.

Test Case Title: The From date must not be greater than the To date.
Test Steps:
1- Enter The From date lager than the To date.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "To date must be larger than From date".

Test Case Title: The Form date filed must not be empty.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the From date field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "From date is required".

Test Case Title: The Form date must not be set to a future date beyond today's date.
Test Steps:
1- Enter a date in the future from today's date.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "From date is invalid".

Test Case Title: The To date must be valid
Test Steps:
1- Enter a valid To date.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result: No errors appear.

Test Case Title: The To date filed must not be empty.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the To date field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "To date is required".

Test Case Title: The manager can reset the data if any field is filled with.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the account number.
2- Leave other fileds empty.
3- Click on the "Reset" button.
Expected Result: The account number should disappear and no errors appear.

Test Case Title: The manager can reset the data if all field is empty.
Test Steps:
1- Leave all fields empty.
3- Click on the "Reset" button.
Expected Result: No errors appear.

Test Case Title: The manager can submit the data by filling all fields.
Test Steps:
1- Enter a valid account number. 
2- Enter the From date. 
3- Enter the To date. 
4- Enter the amount lower limit.
5- Enter the number of transactions.
6- Click on "Submit" button.
Expected Result: The system should successfully show the customized statment.

Test Case Title: The manager cannot submit the data if he leaves the required field empty.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the account number fileld empty. 
2- Enter the From date. 
3- Enter the To date. 
4- Enter the amount lower limit.
5- Enter the number of transactions.
6- Click on "Submit" button.
Expected Result:
The system should display an error
 "account number is required".
